resources.string: I will climb to the top because our dreams are made on top of what we achieve. - Asta
If everyone knew the weight of your words they would give more value to silence. - Itachi
The fear of taking chances is what keeps you from evolving. - Itachi
Until you know someone's pain, you won't know who they are. Even if you know it, you will not be able to understand. - Pain
If you're only good at one thing, become a master of it. - Zenitsu Agatsuma
